name: Kimono and Chibby-Chan Save the World
name_original: Kimono and Chibby-Chan Save the World
description: Based on the animated series "Kimono & Chibby Chan", you play as the masked duo in their first video game adventure! A horror threatens to destroy the world and Kimono & Chibby Chan are humanity's only hope! Use crates supplied by Momo the Marmoset, defend your life and defeat the creature! For up to two players.
